official_name: AIKYASHREE: Merit Cum Means Scholarship for Professional Courses
introduction: Merit Cum Means Scholarship (MCM) under AIKYASHREE is designed specifically for minority students pursuing professional and technical courses like Medical, Engineering, Management, and Law. This scholarship recognizes both merit and financial need.

basic_requirements: Applicant must be a permanent resident of West Bengal
Applicant must belong to an officially notified minority community
Must be enrolled in Medical, Engineering, Management, or Law programs

income_criteria.issued_by: BDO / SDO or any competent government authority

scholarship_benefits.description: Financial assistance covering tuition fees and other educational expenses for professional courses.

important_notes: Specifically for Medical, Engineering, Management, and Law students
Higher income limit of ₹2.5 Lakh compared to general Post Matric
Merit and means both are considered
Renewable annually with good academic performance

official_authority.department: West Bengal Minority Development & Finance Corporation (WBMDFC)
